a.title: A graphic that says "Cascade School District COVID-19 Information

img.alt: A graphic that says "Cascade School District COVID-19 Information

br.br:
This information is intended to update the Cascade School District community on our response plan to the outbreak of the novel coronavirus (COVID-19). The situation is rapidly-evolving and updates change daily as new information becomes available.

Health and Wellness

Questions?: communications@cascade.k12.or.us
More Information
This is an evolving situation. Stay up to date by consulting the following webpages:
Center for Disease Control
Oregon Health Authority
Marion County Health and Human Services
